name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a fragrant purple flower known for its calming scent. Commonly used in aromatherapy, it also attracts pollinators and thrives in sunny, well-drained gardens.

name: Tulips
description: Tulips are classic spring-blooming flowers with bright, cup-shaped petals. They come in many colors and symbolize love, rebirth, and elegance, often seen in gardens and floral displays.

name: Bellis perennis
description: Bellis perennis, or the common daisy, has white petals and a yellow center. Itâ€™s a cheerful wildflower that thrives in lawns, meadows, and low-maintenance gardens.

name: Anthurium Plant
description: Anthurium is a striking tropical plant known for its waxy, heart-shaped spathes. It blooms in red, pink, or white and is popular as a houseplant and cut flower.

name: Floribunda Roses
description: Floribunda roses are bushy, hardy shrubs producing clusters of roses. They bloom continuously through the season and combine color variety with disease resistance and low maintenance.

name: Chrysanthemum
description: Chrysanthemums are colorful, full-headed flowers blooming in fall. Popular in floral arrangements and gardens, they symbolize longevity, happiness, and are often seen during seasonal festivals.
